languages.text: {n}Соломон заглядывает в лицо мертвеца и чеканит:{/n} "Денз Канистра, пират. Разыскивался за многочисленные разбои, нападения на торговые суда. В посягательстве на десятинные суда замечен не был, но Арбитес внесли его в особый список риска с рекомендацией устранить".

{n}Solomorne looks at the dead man's face and says sternly,{/n} "Jerrycan Denz, a pirate. Wanted for countless robberies and attacks on trade vessels. He was never caught assaulting tithe ships, but the Arbites still added his name to the list of high-risk suspects, with a note stating, 'Elimination recommended.'"

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙看着死者的脸，严厉地开了口。{/n}“海盗‘油罐’丹兹，生前因多次抢劫、袭击商船遭到通缉。尽管他从未袭击过装载什一税的货船，但法务部依然建议将他的名字列入危险嫌疑人名单之中，备注上还写着：‘建议清除’。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at the dead man's face and says sternly,{/n} "Jerrycan Denz, a pirate. Wanted for countless robberies and attacks on trade vessels. He was never caught assaulting tithe ships, but the Arbites still added his name to the list of high-risk suspects, with a note stating, 'Elimination recommended.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙看着死者的脸，严厉地开了口。{/n}“海盗‘油罐’丹兹，生前因多次抢劫、袭击商船遭到通缉。尽管他从未袭击过装载什一税的货船，但法务部依然建议将他的名字列入危险嫌疑人名单之中，备注上还写着：‘建议清除’。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne mira el rostro del hombre muerto y dice con severidad:{/n} «Denz Bidones, un pirata. Se le busca por innumerables robos y asaltos a naves mercantes. Nunca se le ha identificado atacando naves del diezmo, pero el Arbites añadió igualmente su nombre a la lista de sospechosos de alto riesgo, con una nota que indicaba "Eliminación recomendada"».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at the dead man's face and says sternly,{/n} "Jerrycan Denz, a pirate. Wanted for countless robberies and attacks on trade vessels. He was never caught assaulting tithe ships, but the Arbites still added his name to the list of high-risk suspects, with a note stating, 'Elimination recommended.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne mira el rostro del hombre muerto y dice con severidad:{/n} «Denz Bidones, un pirata. Se le busca por innumerables robos y asaltos a naves mercantes. Nunca se le ha identificado atacando naves del diezmo, pero el Arbites añadió igualmente su nombre a la lista de sospechosos de alto riesgo, con una nota que indicaba "Eliminación recomendada"».

languages.text: {n}Solomorne examine le visage du cadavre et déclare d'un ton sévère :{/n} « Jerrycan Denz, pirate. Recherché pour d'innombrables vols et attaques de vaisseaux de transport de marchandises. Il n'a jamais tenté d'attaquer de vaisseaux transportant la dîme, mais l'Arbites l'a tout de même intégré à la liste des suspects à haut risque, avec la mention "élimination recommandée",
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at the dead man's face and says sternly,{/n} "Jerrycan Denz, a pirate. Wanted for countless robberies and attacks on trade vessels. He was never caught assaulting tithe ships, but the Arbites still added his name to the list of high-risk suspects, with a note stating, 'Elimination recommended.'"

Il n'a jamais tenté d'attaquer de vaisseaux transportant la dîme, mais l'Arbites l'a tout de même intégré à la liste des suspects à haut risque, avec la mention "élimination recommandée",

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは死体の顔を見つめ、厳しい口調で言った。{/n}「ジェリカン・デンツ、海賊です。無数の強盗と交易船への襲撃で指名手配されています。租税船を襲った証拠はありませんでしたが、それでも高等裁定局は彼を高リスク容疑者リストに加え、『排除推奨』という注記を付けました」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at the dead man's face and says sternly,{/n} "Jerrycan Denz, a pirate. Wanted for countless robberies and attacks on trade vessels. He was never caught assaulting tithe ships, but the Arbites still added his name to the list of high-risk suspects, with a note stating, 'Elimination recommended.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは死体の顔を見つめ、厳しい口調で言った。{/n}「ジェリカン・デンツ、海賊です。無数の強盗と交易船への襲撃で指名手配されています。租税船を襲った証拠はありませんでしたが、それでも高等裁定局は彼を高リスク容疑者リストに加え、『排除推奨』という注記を付けました」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, ölü adamın suratına bakıp sert bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Bidon Denz, bir korsan. Sayısız hırsızlık suçu ve ticari gemilere saldırıdan aranıyor. Aşar gemilerine saldırırken hiç yakalanmamış ama Arbites, yüksek riskli şüpheliler listesine adını eklemiş. Bir de 'Yok edilmesi önerilir.' diye bir not eklemiş."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at the dead man's face and says sternly,{/n} "Jerrycan Denz, a pirate. Wanted for countless robberies and attacks on trade vessels. He was never caught assaulting tithe ships, but the Arbites still added his name to the list of high-risk suspects, with a note stating, 'Elimination recommended.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, ölü adamın suratına bakıp sert bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Bidon Denz, bir korsan. Sayısız hırsızlık suçu ve ticari gemilere saldırıdan aranıyor. Aşar gemilerine saldırırken hiç yakalanmamış ama Arbites, yüksek riskli şüpheliler listesine adını eklemiş. Bir de 'Yok edilmesi önerilir.' diye bir not eklemiş."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne betrachtet das Gesicht des Toten und sagt ernst:{/n} "Kanister Denz, ein Pirat. Gesucht wegen zahlloser Raubzüge und Angriffe auf Handelsschiffe. Bei Überfällen auf Zehntschiffe wurde er nie erwischt, aber die Arbites haben seinen Namen dennoch auf die Liste der gefährlichen Verdächtigen gesetzt, mit der Anmerkung 'Eliminierung empfohlen'."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at the dead man's face and says sternly,{/n} "Jerrycan Denz, a pirate. Wanted for countless robberies and attacks on trade vessels. He was never caught assaulting tithe ships, but the Arbites still added his name to the list of high-risk suspects, with a note stating, 'Elimination recommended.'"
